title: Modern Family: A Day of Chaos
author: OpenAI

morningChaos.text: It's a typical chaotic morning in the Dunphy household. Claire is frantically trying to get everyone ready. Phil wants to test his new drone, and the kids are all over the place.

options.description: Help Claire get the family organized.
Join Phil and test the drone.

helpClaire.text: You try to help Claire, but Luke accidentally lets the dog out, and Haley refuses to wake up.

testDrone.text: You and Phil are having a blast flying the drone—until it crashes into Jay's backyard.

options.description: Try to sneak into Jay's yard to get it.

chaseDog.text: You chase the dog through the neighborhood, knocking over garbage cans. Eventually, you catch him—but now you’re late for the family brunch.

wakeHaley.text: You manage to wake Haley, but she takes forever getting ready. Claire is livid.

sneakIntoJays.text: You sneak in and find the drone, but Jay catches you red-handed. He makes you do yard work as punishment.

askJay.text: Jay appreciates your honesty and hands you the drone. But he can’t resist teasing Phil about it at brunch.

calmClaire.text: Claire eventually cools off. You all pile into the car and head to brunch.

options.description: Sit back and enjoy the ride.

blameHaley.text: Haley gets mad and refuses to talk. Family tension rises at brunch.

brunchChaos.text: Everyone arrives at brunch flustered and bickering. Gloria tries to keep the peace, but Cam and Mitch get caught in the drama too.

options.description: Give a toast to lighten the mood.

brunchOnTime.text: Brunch is a success. Everyone is laughing and enjoying themselves. Even Jay compliments Phil. A rare moment of peace!

brunchLate.text: You arrive late and sweaty. Everyone gives you side-eye, but you made it. Jay keeps smirking.

options.description: Make a joke to win back the crowd.

happyEnding.text: Somehow, your words bring the family together. Everyone smiles and raises a glass. Success!

quietEnding.text: You and Manny sit quietly on the porch, escaping the madness inside. It’s peaceful, at least.
